page.title: 15Law and Order
page.content: The local policeman is moving shortly and another policeman will be coming soon.There has been a crisis of children playing on the railway.Some people have been fined Â£25 for trepassing and you can be prosecuted.In Siddick there is a problem of vandalism. The houses are boarded up because youths smash the windows.If you want a house you have to take the boards down but they will probaby be smashed again.The crime in Seaton is rather high. Seaton school is always getting broken into. Camerton is a small place and I think that it has little crime. In school the local policeman does cycle proficiency every year and it takes about a week. If you pass you get a certificate but if you make just one mistake you fail.
